benchmark_details.name: ISEKAI Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: ISEKAI dataset comprises unseen generated image-label pairs designed for link-context learning, enabling evaluation of MLLMs' performance on recognizing novel concepts.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate the evaluation of multimodal large language models' capabilities in recognizing unseen images and understanding novel concepts through link-context learning.

data.source: Images generated by Stable Diffusion and Midjourney, accompanied by fabricated labels.
data.size: 20 groups, 40 categories, and at least 32 images per new concept
data.annotation: Manually selected images to ensure core concept consistency.

methodology.calculation: Metric calculations are based on comparisons of model performance on the ISEKAI dataset against baseline models.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better understanding and recognition of novel concepts.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments comparing model performance across various configurations.
